Instructions: Using the provided web search results, write a comprehensive reply to the given query. Make sure to cite results using [[number](URL)] notation after the reference. If the provided search results refer to multiple subjects with the same name, write separate answers for each subject.
Query: Universal Unite on Facebook is the same t-shirt brand

Based on the provided web search results, it appears that Universal Unite on Facebook and the Universal Unite clothing brand are not the same as a t-shirt brand.

Universal Unite is a clothing brand that was created in honor of retired E8 Master Sergeant Crispin Mejia Sr. who believed in unity for all [[1][3]]. This brand sells custom t-shirts, among other items, on their website u-unite.com [[2][4]].

On the other hand, Universal Standard is a size-inclusive brand that also sells t-shirts, including their Tee Rex T-shirt which is one of their popular items [[5]]. However, Universal Standard is a different brand from Universal Unite, and there is no indication that they are related.

Therefore, based on the provided web search results, it appears that Universal Unite on Facebook is not the same t-shirt brand as Universal Unite clothing brand, and neither of them are the same as Universal Standard.
